reviewText:
This very sensual program is packed with technique, key elements and tips for a flawless performance for your lover, groom or just to spice things up on that special night. It is also a great gift for a future bride. The art of conceal and reveal becomes exciting as you implement the technique shown.
 Some of the sections are listed below.
Technique and showmanship
10 tips for flawless technique
Stripping out of wedding gown technique
Modern gown step by step, a humorous touch stepping out of mens garb, shirt
Exploring sensuality, bondage, sensual bath and shower show
This program is tastefully done and shot outdoors on a porch with a lovely backdrop of flowing fabric.
Every section is carefully explained and very well demonstrated. A good bridal shower gift.
